description: Strategic guidelines for 2v2 arena combat in Wrath of the Lich King

win_condition.primary: Kill one target (Cross-CC Healer + Burst DPS)

strategy.opener: Sap Healer -> Cheap Shot Kill Target -> Polymorph Healer off Sap.
strategy.reset: If kill fails, both stealth/run. Drink/Eat. Re-open.

strategy.opener: Charge -> Hamstring. Paladin stays max range.
strategy.defense: Hand of Freedom on Warrior 100% uptime. Cleanse everything.

strategy.opener: Silence Healer -> Stunlock Kill Target -> Fear bomb.

Healer_DPS_vs_Healer_DPS.plan: Mana Burn / Dampening style. CC Chain healer (Fear -> Clone -> Silence). Switch to healer if no trinket.

Double_DPS_vs_Healer_DPS.plan: ALL IN. Must kill within first 2 cooldown rotations. If game goes long, you lose.

Healer_DPS_vs_Double_DPS.plan: SURVIVE Opener. Rotate CDs (Trinket -> Wall -> Bubble). Once they exhaust CDs, counter-pressure.
